heroHeadline: Google Ads That Drive Growth in Athenry

description:
Want to dominate local search results and attract more customers to your Athenry business? Kraft Agency delivers Google Ads management specifically designed for businesses in this historic East Galway town. Whether you're serving the local Athenry community, attracting customers from surrounding areas, or reaching businesses across County Galway, we create PPC campaigns that put you in front of potential customers at the exact moment they're searching for your products or services.

Our approach to Google Ads understands Athenry's unique position—a growing town with strong community identity, strategic location on the M6 motorway, and mix of residential, commercial, and industrial sectors. We create campaigns tailored to your specific business type: local retailers serving Athenry residents, service providers covering East Galway, restaurants attracting both locals and passing traffic, or B2B companies targeting businesses in Athenry's commercial parks. Every campaign is strategically structured to reach your ideal customers while maximizing your advertising budget efficiency.

What sets Kraft Agency apart is our combination of certified Google Partner expertise and deep understanding of the Galway market. We use advanced targeting to ensure your ads reach Athenry customers specifically, strategic keyword selection focused on high-intent searches, compelling ad copy that converts clicks into customers, and comprehensive tracking that shows exactly what ROI your Google Ads deliver. With AI-powered optimization and continuous refinement, your campaigns get stronger every month, driving more leads and sales for your Athenry business.

process.title: Athenry Business Analysis
process.description: We dive deep into your business, target customers in Athenry and East Galway, competitive landscape, and growth objectives. This local insight ensures campaigns are perfectly aligned with your market position.

process.title: Strategic Campaign Development
process.description: We build comprehensive Google Ads campaigns with keyword research focused on Athenry searches, location targeting for your exact service area, and compelling ad copy that resonates with local customers.

process.title: Landing Page Optimization
process.description: We ensure your landing pages convert Athenry visitors into customers, with clear value propositions, trust signals, prominent calls-to-action, and mobile optimization for on-the-go searchers.

process.title: Campaign Launch & Monitoring
process.description: Once campaigns go live, we monitor performance closely, making immediate optimizations to bidding, targeting, and ad creative based on real data to maximize results from the start.

process.title: Conversion & Call Tracking
process.description: We implement comprehensive tracking for all valuable actions—phone calls from Athenry customers, form submissions, purchases, bookings—so you can see exactly how Google Ads drives business results.

process.title: Continuous Testing & Improvement
process.description: We never stop optimizing. Through ongoing A/B testing, bid adjustments, keyword refinement, and strategic improvements based on performance data, we steadily increase your campaign ROI over time.

pricingInfo: Google Ads management for Athenry businesses includes monthly management fees starting from €450 for smaller campaigns (€1,000-€1,500 ad spend) up to €1,800+ for comprehensive campaigns (€8,000+ ad spend), plus your actual Google Ads budget. For most local Athenry businesses, we recommend €900-€2,000 monthly ad spend to generate consistent lead flow. We create custom packages based on your industry, competition, and goals. Contact us for a free PPC audit and proposal tailored to your Athenry business.
serviceArea: Athenry and East Galway including Oranmore, Craughwell, Loughrea, Ballinasloe, and all of County Galway
availability: Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM GMT. Local consultations available in East Galway.
yearsExperience: 15+ years combined Google Ads and PPC experience

h2Headings: Why Athenry Businesses Choose Kraft Agency for Google Ads
Our Proven Google Ads Process for Local Businesses
Campaign Types That Work for Athenry Companies
Success Stories from East Galway Businesses
Google Ads FAQs for Athenry Business Owners
Ready to Grow Your Athenry Business?

faq.question: How can Google Ads help my Athenry business?
faq.answer: Google Ads puts your business at the top of search results when Athenry residents and nearby customers search for what you offer. Whether they're searching 'plumber Athenry', 'restaurants near me', or 'accountant East Galway', your ads appear immediately, driving qualified traffic, leads, and sales.

faq.question: What's a good starting budget for Google Ads in Athenry?
faq.answer: For most Athenry businesses, €900-€1,500 per month (€30-50/day) is a good starting point to generate consistent leads. Service-based businesses often start around €1,000/month, while competitive industries may need €1,500-€3,000/month. We'll recommend the right budget for your specific situation during your free audit.

faq.question: Can you target just Athenry or also surrounding areas?
faq.answer: We can target precisely! Using advanced location settings, we can focus ads on Athenry only, Athenry plus a specific radius (5km, 10km, 20km), or include specific nearby towns like Oranmore, Craughwell, or Loughrea. You control exactly where your ads appear based on your service area.

faq.question: How quickly will I see results?
faq.answer: Google Ads delivers fast results—many Athenry businesses see leads within the first week. Initial results appear quickly, while optimal performance develops over 4-8 weeks as we test and refine campaigns. This is much faster than SEO which takes 3-6+ months.

faq.question: What if I'm competing with larger companies?
faq.answer: Local businesses have advantages! We use geo-targeting to compete only in Athenry and East Galway (not nationwide), write ad copy emphasizing your local presence, and target long-tail keywords larger competitors ignore. Smart targeting and local positioning help you compete effectively.

faq.question: How do you track phone calls from ads?
faq.answer: We implement call tracking using unique phone numbers that show which ads and keywords generated each call. You'll see exactly how many phone calls came from Google Ads, what customers searched for, and the ROI on your ad spend. Essential for service businesses!

faq.question: Can Google Ads work alongside my SEO efforts?
faq.answer: Absolutely! PPC and SEO complement each other perfectly. While SEO builds long-term organic rankings, Google Ads provides immediate visibility and traffic. Many successful Athenry businesses use both—PPC for quick wins and competitive keywords, SEO for sustained long-term growth.

faq.question: What happens if my ads aren't performing?
faq.answer: We continuously monitor and optimize campaigns. If performance isn't meeting expectations, we analyze data, adjust strategy, test new ad variations, refine targeting, optimize landing pages, and improve bids. Our commitment is to your success—we work until campaigns deliver positive ROI for your Athenry business.
